It's easy to show a code file
```{shortcodes="false"}
{{< showcode stan/test.stan >}}
```
{{< showcode stan/test.stan >}}

You can also skip lines
```{shortcodes="false"}
{{< showcode stan/test.stan skiplines=1 >}}
```
{{< showcode stan/test.stan skiplines=1 >}}


Or override the default language highlighting
```{shortcodes="false"}
{{< showcode stan/test.stan language=ruby >}}
```
{{< showcode stan/test.stan language=ruby >}}
